summary: The code attempts to clean up multiple instances of a service, likely by unloading them and removing files. It uses xargs to iterate through the list of multiserv instances and execute commands on each instance individually. It also includes additional steps like running "unloadmulti.sh" and deleting the multiserv directory if needed.

details.comment: The code attempts to clean up multiple instances of a service, likely by unloading them and removing files. It uses xargs to iterate through the list of multiserv instances and execute commands on each instance individually. It also includes additional steps like running "unloadmulti.sh" and deleting the multiserv directory if needed.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
#sudo ls -1 multiserv | xargs -I % bash -c "./multikill.sh %"
sudo ls -1 multiserv | xargs -I % bash -c "./mclean.sh %"
#./unloadmulti.sh
#sudo rm -rf multiserv
# you need to unload the thing.
